Hi Shane, 

Confirming GA4 is up and running.

Hi Shane, 

In a few moments, you will receive a request for support@wolfiq.com.au to have Google Analytics permissions updated to admin level. Please approve at your earliest convenience.

full_threads.body: @joel are you able to assist with the GA4 update on https://trueline.net.au/ ?

Spot on, apologies. 

I'll get the dev team to tackle the GA4 update and report back asap.

Hi Shane, 

Perfect, thanks. 

We can absolutely assist. To start the process, can I please ask you to add support@wolfiq.com.au as a user to the GA account?

The process is outlined here: https://support.google.com/analytics/answer/1009702?hl=en#zippy=%2Cin-this-article
Please let me know if you need a hand with the above.

Hi Chris

Hopefully I'm doing this correctly - using separate requests for your ticketing system


So we need to Migrate to GA4, and I've started the process by using the GA4 property setup assistant but of course the first little hurdle and I'm reaching out to you! haha

This first step is regarding Installing the Google TAG

If this is something you can assist with please let me know..






Regards,

Shane
